## Overview

This module tests the function prepInputs. See the file `prepInputsProblems/data/workingAndNot.rtf` for a color coded evaluation of prepInputs as of 3:15pm 16th of May 2018. :)

## Outputs

This module has 28 outputs. Six of these are templates for a mix-matching with `studyArea`, `rasterToMatch`, `useSAcrs` and `maskWithRTM` arguments. See outputObjects in `prepInputsProblems/prepInputsProblems.R`.

## Usage

```{r module_usage}
# Use this with SpaDES.tools project to fix prepInputs

devtools::load_all()
library(SpaDES.core)

  workDirectory <- getwd() # Or change directory to create folders. Place the module `prepInputsProblems` in the module folder.
  
  paths <- list(
    cachePath = file.path(workDirectory, "cache"),
    modulePath = file.path(workDirectory, "modules"),
    inputPath = file.path(workDirectory, "inputs"),
    outputPath = file.path(workDirectory, "outputs")
  )
  
  setPaths(modulePath = paths$modulePath, inputPath = paths$inputPath, outputPath = paths$outputPath, cachePath = paths$cachePath)
  
times <- list(start = 0, end = 1)

parameters <- list()
modules <- list("prepInputsProblems")
objects <- list() #polyMatrix = matrix(c(-121.85, 53.04), ncol = 2))
inputs <- list()
outputs <- list()

#debug(postProcess)
mySim <- simInit(times = times, params = parameters, modules = modules,objects = objects)
#debug(postProcess)
mySimOut <- spades(mySim)
```
